summary: Syntax file for SVF - Serial Vector Format files
name: SVF-syntax
description:
" Vim syntax file
" Language:	SVF - Serial Vector Format, Revision E, 8 March 1999
install_details:
Copy svf.vim to your $HOME/.vim/syntax directory and add 

  autocmd BufNew,BufRead *.svf setf svf

to your .vimrc.
